title: Projects,chalices, ca. 1930
medium: Pencil; yellow, red, and blue watercolor; white heightening; black crayon; creamy paper
markings: Watermark: tops of letters E or F, D, C
description: Vertical rectangle. Bordering line as 1939-84-20. Signature as 1939-84-79. A cross with a diamond and a band with gems at the shaft. Knob with medallions similar to 1939-84-81-b, and diamonds at the knob.

tombstone.epitaph: Projects,chalices, ca. 1930.Pencil; yellow, red, and blue watercolor; white heightening; black crayon; creamy paper. 1939-84-82-a.
